attributes.action: Suspend Labour MP David Lammy for asking Parliament to defy the EU Referendum.
attributes.background: The EU Referendum has been completed and the country has voted to leave the EU. Parliament has to respect the will of the majority of the nation. Having a MP call on Parliament to defy this will goes against democracy and is an insult to the people.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for suspending MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
